text: The Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2022 was the twentieth edition of the Junior Eurovision Song Contest. It took place at Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concerts Complex, Yerevan, Armenia on 11 December 2022, Armenian broadcaster Public Television Company of Armenia (AMPTV) was the host broadcaster for the event. The motto for the contest was "Spin the Magic". == List of participating countries == 16 countries competed in the 2022 edition. Azerbaijan, Bulgaria, Germany and Russia was absent from the contest.
